## Course Description

Advanced statistical methods for data analysis including regression, time series, and multivariate techniques.

## Prerequisites

- STAT 400 or equivalent
- Linear algebra

## Learning Outcomes

By the end of this course, students will be able to:

1. Apply advanced regression techniques
2. Analyze time series data
3. Implement multivariate methods
